# mythicbeasts_vps_pricing (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = ">= 1.3.0"

  required_providers {
    mythicbeasts = {
      source = "paultibbetts/mythicbeasts"
    }
  }
}

data "mythicbeasts_vps_pricing" "all" {}

output "pricing" {
  value = data.mythicbeasts_vps_pricing.all
}
```

## Schema

### Read-Only

- `disk` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--disk))
- `ipv4` (Number) Price (in pence per month) for one IPv4 address
- `products` (Map of Number)

<a id="nestedatt--disk"></a>
### Nested Schema for `disk`

Read-Only:

- `hdd` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--disk--hdd))
- `ssd` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--disk--ssd))

<a id="nestedatt--disk--hdd"></a>
### Nested Schema for `disk.hdd`

Read-Only:

- `extent` (Number) GB per unit of HDD space
- `price` (Number) Price (in pence for month) per unit of HDD space


<a id="nestedatt--disk--ssd"></a>
### Nested Schema for `disk.ssd`

Read-Only:

- `extent` (Number) GB per unit of SSD space
- `price` (Number) Price (in pence for month) per unit of SSD space
